name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Crypto Screener - Check Prices, Volume, Volatility, and more!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gainium Screener Browser Extension: Real-time crypto analytics and customizable filters in one easy-to-use tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Gainium Screener Browser Extension enhances your trading experience by providing a customizable and efficient way to monitor and analyze cryptocurrency markets to uncover trading opportunities.

Key Features:
- Customizable Columns: Show, hide, re-arrange, and resize columns to view only the data you need.
- Advanced Filters: Filter coins based on over 17 metrics, including price change, volume, volatility, and market cap.
- Saved Filters and Notifications: Save your filters, get real-time browser notifications, and optional sound alerts for new coins in the screener.
- Light and Dark Mode: Switch between light and dark modes for better visibility and reduced eye strain.
- History Tracking: Keep track of new assets that appear in the screener.
- Export Lists: Export your filtered coin lists in various formats for further analysis.

Why You Should Install It
- Efficiency: Quickly access and analyze market data directly in your browser.
- Customization: Tailor the screener to your specific trading needs with adjustable columns and filters.
- Real-Time Alerts: Stay informed about new opportunities with browser notifications and sound alerts.
- Ease of Use: Easily switch between different filters and modes, and export data for more in-depth analysis.
- Uncover new opportunities: With all relevant data at your fingertips, make more informed and confident decisions.

Install the Gainium Screener Browser Extension to enhance your trading strategy and stay ahead in the fast-paced cryptocurrency market.
